member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnLogin
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a successful login to the provided streaming service occurs

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnTextMessageReceived
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a text message is received

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnJoinChannel
member.summary: Callback that occurs when the user joins a chat channel

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnRoomStateUpdated
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a chat channel receives updated info

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnLeaveChannel
member.summary: Callback that occurs when the user leaves a chat channel

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnChatCleared
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a users chat is cleared. If null, that means the entire chat was cleared; otherwise the argument is a user id.

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnMessageCleared
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a specific chat message is cleared. Argument is the message id to be cleared.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Id
member.summary: The internal identifier associated with this message

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Message
member.summary: The actual message, if one exists for the current message Type.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.IsSystemMessage
member.summary: Whether or not the message was generated by the chat service or another user

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.IsActionMessage
member.summary: Whether or not the message is an action (/me) message

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Type
member.summary: The IRC message type for this TwitchMessage

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Sender
member.summary: A reference to the TwitchUser that send this message

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Channel
member.summary: A reference to the TwitchChannel that this message was received in

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Emotes
member.summary: Info about any emotes that are in this message

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Metadata
member.summary: Any metadata fields associated with the current TwitchMessage, such as user color, channel info, etc.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchRoomstate.SlowModeInterval
member.summary: The number of seconds a chatter without moderator privileges must wait between sending messages

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchRoomstate.MinFollowTime
member.summary: If FollowersOnly is true, this specifies the number of minutes a user must be following before they can chat.

member.name: M:StreamCore.Services.Twitch.TwitchMessageParser.ParseRawMessage(System.String,System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary{System.String,StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatChannel},StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage[]@)
member.summary: Takes a raw Twitch message and parses it into an IChatMessage
member.param: The raw message sent from Twitch
A list of chat messages that were parsed from the rawMessage

member.name: M:StreamCore.Services.Twitch.TwitchService.SendRawMessage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a raw message to the Twitch server
member.param:
Whether or not the message should also be sent to other clients in the assembly that implement StreamCore, or only to the Twitch server.
This should only be set to true if the Twitch server would rebroadcast this message to other external clients as a response to the message.
